author: Afshan Yasmeen
title: Five children and an RJ bring cheer to this ward
description: They are admitted to the COVID-19 ward in Victoria Hospital and are asymptomatic carriers of the virus
content:
With five children admitted to the COVID-19 ward in the Emergency and Trauma Care Centre on the Victoria Hospital campus, the ward has almost acquired a playschool atmosphere. An RJ is also trying to keep the mood upbeat.
The five children include a six-year… [+2388 chars]
